current.newsletter_popup_text: Join our A-List to receive updates on exclusive sales offers, discounts and more!
current.about_program: To demonstrate how much we cherish our loyal customers, you can gain rewards in more ways than purchasing your favorite products.
current.referral_description: Here at our store, we firmly believe that sharing is caring. Invite your friends to our store and be rewarded for your referral!
current.spending_description: Now that you have some hard earned points, here's how you can spend them.
current.sm_answer_1: You can spend your points by logging into your customer account and then clicking on the launcher. Under the 'Rewards' section, you can click 'Redeem' next to the reward that you want to claim!
current.sm_question_2: How much does it cost to join?
current.sm_answer_2: Our rewards program is totally free! We do it to say 'thank you' to our awesome customers!
current.sm_question_3: Is there a limit to how many order points I can get?
current.sm_answer_3: There is no limit! Collect as many points as you please.
current.image_2_subtitle: One of our central missions is to mentor young people, particularly young people of color that are interested in careers in science, technology, engineering and math.

settings.title: Give the Gift of Healthy Hair + Scalp
Schedule a  Virtual Scalp and Hair Consult with Dr. Isfahan!
settings.text: Dr. Isfahan is a Certified Trichologist, PhD Scientist and Founder of Alodia

settings.title: Clean Green Beauty Products backed by Science
Take the Guesswork out of Having Healthy Hair & Scalp
settings.text: Our easy to use kits come with 3-5 products and a step by step guide making it easy to style your hair and establish a healthy scalp and hair routine. You will see a difference from your first use!

settings.quote: "I’ve tried just about every dandruff shampoo and treatment out there. The Scalp Therapy Kit did not disappoint.   My scalp felt refreshed, clean, and there was no build up, itching, or irritation afterwards."
settings.name: Reese S.

settings.quote: "I have not seen a product like this. It really does do a great job of protecting and moisturizing the hair prior to applying heat. It keeps the hair amazingly soft. I love it."
settings.name: Demetria H.

settings.quote: "The result was amazing. My 4c high porosity hair soaked in the product's richness. My hair was so soft afterwards. My fro was beautiful, and did not shrink down as it dried. I will buy this again."
settings.name: Cassandra S.

settings.quote: "Everything that's needed in one package!!!! My wash and go kit gives the peace of mind that I have a chance at healthy thicker hair. I will buy again."
settings.name: Natalie E.
